scripts.build: npm run generate-ts; npm run compile; npm run generate-jschema; npm run generate-python; npm run generate-csharp; npm run generate-java
scripts.generate-ts: mkdir -p lang/ts && cd schema && quicktype --lang typescript -s typscript ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts -o ../lang/ts/envelope.ts; tsc ../lang/ts/envelope.ts
scripts.generate-jschema: mkdir -p lang/jschema && cd schema && quicktype --lang schema -s typescript ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts -o ../lang/jschema/envelope.json
scripts.generate-python: mkdir -p lang/python && cd schema && quicktype --lang python -s python ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts -o ../lang/python/envelope.py
scripts.generate-csharp: mkdir -p lang/csharp && cd schema && quicktype --lang csharp -s csharp ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts -o ../lang/csharp/envelope.cs
scripts.generate-java: mkdir -p lang/java && cd schema && quicktype --lang java -s java ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts -o ../lang/java/envelope.java
